title: @meddler Why is teemo never addressed?
body: I mean i have been hit by a 1500 blind dart by teemo. Comparatively to sol, whose ult can't even do that, it's broken. Teemo's shrooms are op broken, with unreal slows and damage even with mr. Why is he untouched?

replies.body: This is a first, someone complaining that teemo is too _good_?

Haha, as a Teemo main, it always bewilders me how people can complain about Teemo when he's so bad in this meta, and HAS been bad for the past 2-3 years.

Poe's Law if this is a troll post though.

Yeah, Riot needs to seriously address Akali, Kalista and Urgot too. And don't forget about Aatrox. Azir too. They definitely need a huge nerf right now, as soon as they go 25/0 they're almost impossible to deal with.
Cz he actually sucks right now. Even a full tank Sion can seriously rekt him.
